data.text: @DearSA_national @RobHutchinson8 Huge red flag in this article! Government not wanting to get their hands dirty but demanding it of  other.

@DearSA_national he would love to see everyone vaccinated. With a vaccine that doesn't work??

What an ass!

@DearSA_national #VaccinePassports MAKE it mandatory by means of coercion - disadvantaging those who didn't bow down.
Therefore the REAL issue is #NoVaccinePassports.
@DearSA_national What type of institution is a university? Not that it should matter, because all mandates are unconstitutional and of course unethical.

@DearSA_national So companies like @Discovery_SA @Dischem et al can impose unconstitutional mandatory vaccinations and get away with it. How can it be ok for the private sector but not public sector. It is rubbish all the same - surely this statement kills these murderer companies plans?
